department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的是讓學生瞭解如何進行學位論文之寫作與其成果之發表，課程內容除介紹學位論文之必要成分外，並將藉由介紹研討會論文、期刊論文等不同形式的發表管道與技巧，讓學生熟悉如何將學位論文研究成果進行書面與口頭發表，以利提升其寫作與發表之能力，進而提升研究成果之可讀性與價值。
goal.en: "The objective of this course is to introduce how to prepare a well-organized research publication, especially for degree thesis. This course will introduce what the important components for degree thesis, conference paper and journal paper are, and how to prepare them in a professional manner. Moreover, how to make a good oral presentation will be taught in this course. In sum, the participated students in this course will have a chance to improve their capabilities of writing and issuing, and further to improve the readability and value of their researches in the future."

outline.ch:
"1.課程介紹
2.校內研究與論文撰寫資源介紹
3.學位論文格式與必要內容
4.研討會論文、期刊論文之主要內容
5.專業文獻管理軟體介紹
6.學位論文案例分析
7.研討會論文案例分析
8.期刊論文案例分析
9.論文摘要撰寫重點與練習
10.論文寫作倫理介紹
11.口頭發表技巧與練習
12.營建管理重要期刊介紹
13.期末報告與討論"
outline.en:
"1.Course introduction
2.Introduction to the resources in the campus for research and thesis writing
3.Thesis format and important components
4.Important components for conference and journal articles
5.Writing with professional reference management tools
6.Criticism on example theses
7.Criticism on example journal articles
8.Criticism on example conference article
9.Essentials of abstract writing
10.Introduction to publication ethics
11.Oral presentation skills and practices
12.Introduction to the high-ranked professional journals in construction management domain
13.Term report presentation and discussion"
